FuncDef: The reset netstream cache command forcibly ages out IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flows on the device. The reset netstream cache command forcibly ages out IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flows on the device.
CLIs: reset netstream cache { ip | ipv6 | vxlaninner-ip } slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Ages VXLAN flexible flow statistics forcibly.
-

Specifies the inner packet of the IPv4 type for VXLAN packets.
-

Specifies the slot ID.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.
